snippet: Portions of the Maruti Suzuki factory, which is controlled by the Japanese car maker, were burned during a fight between workers and management.
abstract: Portions of the Maruti Suzuki factory, which is controlled by the Japanese car maker, were burned during a fight between workers and management.

byline.original: By VIKAS BAJAJ and SRUTHI GOTTIPATI

headline.main: Clash at Maruti Auto Factory Leaves One Dead and Scores Wounded
